featured.text: Mortuary poles were also raised to honor the dead, but they differed from memorial poles, having a burial box placed at the top of the pole.
Inside the burial box were the remains of the deceased.

definition.zh_def: 埋葬，指將遺體放入土中或其他地方以進行安葬的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of placing a dead body into the ground or another location for interment.
definition.example: The burial took place in the family plot at the local cemetery.
